sections.heading: Overview
content:
Duncan J. Turner, MD, FACOG, is originally from England and attended the
Medical School of St. Thomas Hospital at the University of London. His
residency in obstetrics and gynecology was completed at the University of
Colorado Medical Center in Denver. Turner is board certified in obstetrics and
gynecology.

In addition, Turner has had additional training in pediatrics and experience
in family practice prior to specializing in obstetrics and gynecology. He has
been in private practice in Santa Barbara, Calif., since 1978, and he practices
a full service of obstetrics and gynecology, with particular interest in
infertility, laparoscopic surgery, and urogynecology.

He is frequently involved in teaching surgical and laser techniques to other
physicians and giving lectures to the public on infertility, menopause, bladder
function, and alternatives to hysterectomy.
